title: User Authentication and Security Infrastructure
summary: Implement secure login and multi-factor authentication system for portal users
description: Develop a robust authentication mechanism allowing users to securely log in using multi-factor authentication. Implement encryption protocols to protect sensitive data during transmission and storage. Ensure compliance with all relevant financial security standards and audit requirements. Set up session management and timeout features to safeguard user sessions against unauthorized access. Provide self-service options for password management and recovery.

title: Responsive User Interface and Design Framework
summary: Create a responsive and modern portal interface for desktop, tablet, and mobile users
description: Design an intuitive user interface that ensures consistent user experience across all devices. Utilize a responsive design framework to automatically adapt layouts for desktops, tablets, and smartphones. Implement accessibility best practices and ensure compliance with international accessibility standards. Establish the design foundation for subsequent modules such as dashboards, forms, and notifications.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate portal with existing core banking system for real-time data exchange
description: Develop secure integration services to connect the self-service portal with the bank’s current core banking system. Implement APIs for retrieving user account data, product eligibility details, and transaction summaries. Establish data synchronization mechanisms and failover handling to ensure consistent performance and reliability. Validate integration with test data before syncing with live production APIs.

title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
summary: Develop a personalized dashboard showing products, services, and account information
description: Build a user-specific dashboard that displays relevant banking products and services based on the customer’s profile and eligibility. Include summary views of active accounts, pending requests, and recent interactions. Allow custom configurations such as quick links and preferred account views. Ensure dashboard data refreshes in real-time leveraging integrated core banking data.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable digital account requests and modifications through guided workflows
description: Implement intuitive workflow processes allowing customers to open new accounts and modify existing banking services online. Each step should guide users using clear instructions and validation checks. Ensure minimal clicks and an easy-to-navigate interface. Integrate workflow triggers with backend systems to automatically route requests for internal review and approval. Provide features to upload supporting documents directly via the portal.

title: Application Save and Resume Capability
summary: Allow users to save incomplete applications and continue later
description: Enable users to save the state of partially completed applications for account opening or service modifications. Securely store temporary data within the portal’s database ensuring confidentiality and integrity. Provide clear navigation for users to retrieve and resume saved applications seamlessly. Maintain session continuity and notify users about incomplete tasks when logging in.

title: Notifications and Real-Time Status Tracking
summary: Implement automated email notifications and live status updates for requests
description: Set up a real-time status tracking system for all user-submitted requests such as account openings and modifications. Configure automated email notifications to alert customers at key stages of the request lifecycle. Provide a consolidated view within the portal where customers can monitor progress and expected completion timelines. Integrate notification preferences allowing users to control communication settings.

title: Interaction History and Data Management
summary: Maintain detailed logs of user interactions for transparency and compliance
description: Design and implement a comprehensive interaction history module to record all customer activities within the portal. Include timestamps, request types, and status changes for full auditability. Ensure data storage adheres to regulatory compliance and data retention policies. Provide user-friendly history views and filtering options for customers to review past activities.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
summary: Implement authorization framework to control user access levels
description: Develop role-based access control mechanisms ensuring users can only view and modify services permitted by their authorization level. Configure roles such as retail customer, corporate user, and administrative staff. Integrate RBAC with the authentication system to enforce security at both the UI and data levels. Include audit tracking for role and permission changes.
